content.raw: This seems like a powerful feature. Without this, I believe you would need a `PluginPtr` and use it to request a new `EnginePtr` with the missing features and then get new entities from that `EnginePtr`. I think there are several use cases for this in ign-gazebo, when a particular code path might want to do this, but it currently doesn't have a `PluginPtr`
